description: With 15 matches under her belt, 17 submissions, and zero shame points this season, Dragon takes on the upstart Nightmare. The Nightmare is ruthless. If you wrestle her and lose, you pay the price in RD4. The Dragon is ranked #2 and is one of US's premiere wrestlers. However the Nightmare is unnatural. The dragon pays the ultimate price for defeat, a RD4 she will soon not forget!
title: The Dragon (Lifetime 12-3) vs. The Nightmare (Lifetime 2-0)
